#!/bin/bash
set -e

# Clean old code including dotfiles
rm -rf /home/container/* /home/container/.[!.]* /home/container/..?*

# Clone fresh code from GitHub
git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/sebastianspicker/cs2-modded-server-panel.git /home/container
cd /home/container

# Write environment variables
cat > .env <<EOF
DEFAULT_USERNAME=${DEFAULT_USERNAME}
DEFAULT_PASSWORD=${DEFAULT_PASSWORD}
PORT=${DEFAULT_PORT}
EOF

# Install production dependencies with native bcrypt
npm ci --omit=dev --build-from-source=bcrypt

# (Optional) Show commit
git rev-parse --short HEAD || true

# Set permissions for Pterodactyl
chown -R 1000:1000 /home/container
